verbs.description: [ARG1: You] [V: 're] [ARG2: delusional] [ARGM-ADV: if you think Donald Trump ’s decisions to pardon boxer Jack Johnson and commute Alice Johnson 's sentence are n't part of a greater plan] .
You 're delusional if [ARG0: you] [V: think] [ARG1: Donald Trump ’s decisions to pardon boxer Jack Johnson and commute Alice Johnson 's sentence are n't part of a greater plan] .

You 're delusional if you think Donald Trump ’s decisions to pardon boxer Jack Johnson and [V: commute] [ARG1: Alice Johnson 's sentence] are n't part of a greater plan .
You 're delusional if you think [ARG1: Donald Trump ’s decisions to pardon boxer Jack Johnson and commute Alice Johnson 's sentence] [V: are] [ARGM-NEG: n't] [ARG2: part of a greater plan] .
